Pre-Game Insights: Wales are under a new head coach, Craig Bellamy, after a disappointing run in recent tournaments.
Turkey has a strong attacking lineup, including young talents like Kenan Yildiz and Arda Guler.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales' starting lineup includes several new faces, such as Karl Darlow and Owen Beck.
Turkey's key players, including Hakan Calhanoglu, are expected to start.
Others: The match is significant for both teams as it marks the start of their Nations League campaigns.
Wales aims to rebuild under Bellamy, while Turkey looks to build momentum after their Euro 2024 performance.
